tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: During her time in Nepal, #HeroesofUSDiplomacy honoree Patti Morton was featured in a @StateDept brochure to recruit womenâ€¦
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: During her time in Nepal, #HeroesofUSDiplomacy honoree Patti Morton was featured in a @StateDept brochure to recruit women to join the Foreign Service. Later in her career she advocated for more diverse recruitment and hiring practices. Learn more here: go.usa.gov/xfa2T.
